Changelog
=========

0.0.1 - Unreleased
----------------
* Initial release, original TTW python script for getting some useful info

0.0.2 - Unreleased
----------------
* Added lots of shiny
* Added the_oracall
* Added PDB

0.0.3 - First release
----------------
* Changed system to use content providers (allows products to add their own
  information)
* Made prettier
* Added syntax highlighting for code stuff
